title: Understanding the Nature of our Relationship with God by Exploring the Microbiome
description:
I’m going to mention Jonathan Pageau here because I get more views when I do. 

This video from the crazy mudfossil University guy got me thinking about the microbiome as an analogy for our relationship with God, and the necessity of the incarnation. 

https://youtu.be/73SfJtAtsNo

“Strengthen me with Raisins” song by Randall Goodgame & Slugs and Bugs https://youtu.be/XYlf3Xw2Lt8


Microbiome videos

https://youtu.be/VzPD009qTN4

https://youtu.be/shhX98Nxg38
